name: ColorCallerGame
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: color caller
des:
The Color Caller Game is a simple game, perfect for kids of all ages.
Just say, "Alexa, open Color Caller" to start the game.
Alexa will say "Tag this color", and the first person to find or tag the selected color, wins!
To continue playing, say "Next color", or "what color", or "next".

Have Fun!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
